title: What problems can arrive when we try to scale out a system for big amount of data
body:
What kind of problem can arrive when we try to scale out a system for big amount of data, like i wrote a scheduler to schedule work to employees using hashset, and map . Now if i scale work to 10 lakh n employees to few thousand.

What kind of problems i have to face in real time implementation. I just want to get different angles, if guys having experience can put some , it will be really helpful. Thank You..
